comments.comment:
Api danna samanali metaram pahat akaraye enna charitayak kiyala me sidu weemen apita terum ganna puluwan una.....kala kirenewa mewani kantawan ape rate enna ekat...mewagema sagavila enna dusita kanatawnut enna wa..un hangila tamai karanne hama nari wadakma...
.samanali eli pitama...etta apita kantawata sama tana dunne...*Ati *SAMMA* *SAMBUDDA* *BUDU* *RAJANANA* *WAHANSE* e gaurawayat oba tibbada .. samanali oba bauddayskda mona agamaka uwat mewani neecha kriyawan kantawan wasayen api hela  dakinawa.....owi ada piriminari   gada gassana boho nari wada karana ayai...  namut kantawatanta wadiya niyama yahapat pirimin ennawa ape rate...desa palakayan hara yahapat kantawan sulu wasayen ennawa ape rate...kantawa uanu sansare pin madi wee bihiwana ayai...namut utum mau padaviya labana utum mauwarun gedara budun amma yai parachaitai....e namut e padaviyatat niga karana obala wani katun me mulu maha kanatawantama pililayak...lajjai samanali kiyanna...mewani kiriya anuwanai...obage sawanallawat dakinna api kamati naha...oya piriminta pahara denna awassanam wena nuwankara karamayak tibune natida....ma tawama mawak nowemi...namut mamawa u data oba wage diyaniyak mata bihi unot mama karana eakama de tamai ..ataharala damana eka...oba wani diyaniyak bihi karapu mawada pera kala akusalayakata obawan diyaniyak labuwe.....oba wani kantawan tamai ada me rate kantawanwa vinasa kara damanne......pirimi nari wada karanawa kiyala kantawat e dema kalanama hari yanawada....kantawan ohuwa yaha magata yamata kriya karanna one......trisanun vidiyata wada karanna epa samanali....oya pilikawak wage udu duwanawa kantawange siruret.....mat paninin taora ratak karanna neda sadanne ekata udau karanna......samanali oba agamak dahamak adahanne nati kenek eka manawin penenewa.....oya hitanne oya maha loku pin ate wadak kala kiyalada....satahan pata tiikak belle ella gena yanawa maha parata udgosanaya karanawa mat panin tora desayak goda nagamu kiyala.......ehala sanskrutiyak eti ape rata pivituru budu dahamat eti me pvituru jannma bumiye oba wannata jeewat wannta nusudui me bumiya....... kantawanta ada onewata wadiya nidahasa dela tiyenne..eken autu paroyojana ganna epa....me sasare tamunlata enna wenne niraye pasi pasi..kalapa gananan.....oya dusita wada karana pirimintat ehama tamai......danwat oya karana pau walata samawa ganawa.desapalakayangen nowe taman adahana agamaen .mokada apita dukai tamulla wage aya nirayta yanawata...balu wada nokara danwat hadenewa oya manisika ledata waddaya warayekugen parti kara kara ganna.....waratamana desa palakain samaga api pahadeemakin neme enne....eyalage waradi tibenewa..namut eyala karae ape taruna parapura arakssa karanna rate janatawata mat panin tora ratatk bihhi karannta..eka waraddak nowi neda samanai.......obala wage ayata hodai usa, uropa ratawal ..ehe giyanam oyalata one vidiyata natanna puluwan......desa palakayan janatawata kotaram asadarakam karanawada ewata nagee sitnnako.....vilapattuwe vinasa wela giya ratin bagayak dunna vijatikayata...lama apachchra kanta  dusasa gatana kudu matadarawaya nisamewa gewana unata viruddawa ugosana karanna nadu danna.....oyala ratata barak oyalage kama sapa gana vitari sitanne....rata jatiyata agamata kisima adarayak nati dusita nidda sahagata gahaniyak oba samanali......oya gana kiyanna giyot mage wadat padwenawa .....me ketiyen.......sinhala mawakage kiri bipu sinhala diyaniyak nowei oba ..balu kiri pipu keneku oba samanali.....
comments.author: Udhudh Champa

replies.replyComment: dinusha ariyarathna mata molayak nati aya ekka kata karala wadak.naha...manisika waddaya wareyk hambaba welaa oya rogayata behat ganna..oya samanlita kade yana kenek..etin oba apasu mata comment,s karatat apsu riplay karot..mama ayi eka ballenewat natiwa ayin karanawa...baking dog's seldom bait....mata keemata ette eya pamanai mama nuwank karayek hatiyata obata apsu no riplay....manisaka waddaya warayek hamu wenna.....budu saranai....wiryen wierya nosan side awairayen awirya san side..etin mayatree karmi obata ....Wish You all the best.....

Udhudh Champa pirimi ekka karata kara innawanan pin adu wenne kmda? nadayo Europe wala nan inne a ratawalata gihilla ganna hoda dewal me ratata aran enna. eken wadagatma DE sanskruthiyata wada nidahasata thana dena eka. ape ratawal thama me thathwe thiyenne eeelaga athme gana hithanawa me athme gana hithanna kalin. kawadawath dakala nathi diwya loka gana hithanawa. kauda danne lokopakare monatharan durata awrudu ganak thisse wenas welada kiyala. nikan pothaka suthreka thibba pamanin dewal piliganna epa. anika ganiyekta bonna orne nan beepudin bar ekka natanna orne nan natapudin wayasen morala nan. apita moko????  api mehema karamu. pita rata bar wala pirimi ekka nata nata inna ganu okkoma hire dala., ape ganuntath burka ekak andala ge athule thiyagamu. loke hama kanthawakatama neethi damu godak hirawenna. ethakota me loke thawa thawath lassana wei appa. hari..! üòÑüòÑela ela. man hithuwe lankawe minissu aduma tharame open minded hithannawath dannawa athi kjyala. balan yanakota ekath na ithin. dan saudi arabiyath ganu ayata tiken tika nidahasa dena kaleka api duwanawa apassata me wage redde gon harak balaye inna hinda. methana samanalee sampurnemma hari. ganiyek bar ekka natana eka waradaknan hire danna awrudu 3ne 4 lamai dushanaya karana pirimi thama uthumma pin wadiwa upan jathiya.unta nidahasa demu. manda pin wadi jathiyane. ane thoge logic.. get a life

dinusha ariyarathna ow mama modayek wenna puluwan..mata meloke labenna one hama deyakma labila tiyenne ewagema mata hoda admika bawaya wadi diynu wechcha kenek mama boruwata kamat naha..mata godak sapa vidina kenek boho dewal jaya gatta kenek..et me loke api hoyana yatartaya naha..mewa siyallama dema anittayai.paw karana minisuta mama kamatima naha..mata kawata hadanna awasa naha et obalage comment ekata mama uttara badinawa... et..oyala kiyan oya mirguwal passe yanna mata umanawak naha...ow kantawa pin adu nisa tamai epadenne...namut ada ape rate loke bahulawa gahanun pirmin samaga karata kara..eka mama naha kiyanne naha....namut mama kiyanne me mat pan walata rajayen dapu  tahanamata samanli nagee sitiya kiyala..e kiyanne eyat pirimin wagema matata waha una kenek..etin oyama hitanna mewani katun tawa kopmana edda ape rate..oya eka buddimatwa hitanna me loke jaya gatta ussa kula kantawan ennawa mama ewani aya gana metanata edala ganne naha...mama kiyanne kantawanta karana hadana vinasaya ..me samanli..oya eka terum ganna....ekata virdda wela neda oya mata comment kale...oya dannawada modaya kauda nuwanakkarayavkauda kiyala mata terum ganna puluwan...mage paule boho denek enne U,s,a..ewagema Erope ratawala eayama kiyanawa ape rate kantawan eda hodai et dan ape rate kantawan e ratwal wala gihilla karana wada......bar walata gihilla bila pirimi ekka gihilla nasti wrna hati...ape e akkala ho mallila nangila apita kiyanawa..eyalage at dakeem....oya atare sulu pirisak ennawa tamange kama raka gena enna gunavyahapat kantawan...bana bawana karagena enna aya ennawa...eyalata kala kirila tiyenne..etin mama kisima kotuwaka tani wrea naha mata labuna danuma labenena danuma hidatama eti......me loke gana bakanna epa ape rata gana vitarak balanna yalu....hara mitiyen yana dakata obata terevi hode..budu saranai

Udhudh Champa deiyane....! mata dan therenawa oya inna prashne.
 lemme guess. oya echara sathutin jeewithaya sarthakawa gatha karana kenek neme. oya mata me loke kisima deyak karanna puluwan kiyala hithana kenek neme. oya jeewithe paradila. ekata excuses hoyana kenek witharai. pitarata sanskruthiyak na? attatama apitai sanskruthiyak natte. kiyanna ai ape wage uthum rata wala minissunta Switzerland wage ratawala citizenship wath denne natte? dunnath ekata awrudu 15 wada kalayak yanne? echara sanskruthiyak thibilath balanna a minissu kochara diunuda kiyala. kochara apachara sthree dushana aduda kiyala. issella piliganna api paradila kiyala. meka budun wadiya uthum rata gaga ussa ussa hitiyoth apita kawafawath nagitinna hambenne ne. nagitinna watila kiyala therun ganna orne. üò•üò∞ buddimaththu 1000 ekka katha karanna puluwan 1ka modayek ekka katha karanna ba. ow mama ipadila thiyenne buddha darmaya adahana paulaka thama. eth man loke dakina hama dema prashna karanawa. man kisima deyak budun kiwwa pamanin hari wena kauru hari kiwwa pamanin hari lokopakare kiwwa pamanin piliganne neüòÇ... man hithanne man a patten oyata wada bauddhayek mokada budun wahansemai kiyala thiyenne prashna karanna kiyala. mage paulwala ganu aya kisima kenek oya hithanawa wage hithanne ne. ehema hithanna purudu karanneth ne. oya mahalokuwata sirimawo gana kiyawanawa, sirimawo oya widihata hithuwoth kawadawath aya agamathi kenek wenne ne. oya paradila. oya oyagema lokeka hira wela. kanthawanta pin adu wage gon katha kiya kiya inne nathuwa loketa wadak karanna. nattan karunakarala anith ganunta oya wage kunuharapa adahas nodi inna.

ThatDirty SriLankanGuy ane paw mamane gon haraka..oya nemene..mata padu wenne naha...oyatama kiya gatta me wachchanaya oyata hodata galapenewa ..mama poddawak salanne naha obata satutuida dan......oyala etin mat pan papapala wena eti neda...mat pan gahanu pirimi serama ayata hoda naha..etin..kantawan sama tan ellane pirimi wagema mat pan salawal wala sewaya karanna daganna ..etin ape rate hatiyata gala penewada utum mu padaviya labana ape kantwanta mokada wenne....bauddayedda oba ..ehemanam   ..ape pujaya pakassaya hamu wela me gana kata karanna .un wahansela mewata uttra dei....api api wemu..pita rata karana dewal apita uchita naha....kalyana mituran esuru karanna..obata me jeevitaye yatartaya hodata wata hevi.....api buddimatwa sittana one....sada sampanna param parawak bihi karanna one..api tirsunun neme..me manussa jvitayak labune....api pera karapu kusal anuwa...piromiyek wrla epadenna sahenna pin karanna one..kantawak wela upadinne pin madi kama nisa....api kantta atmayak labala tawat paw purawa ganna awssada......ada kantawa nisa rate sahena aparada sidu wenewa  ..onema aparadayakata kantawak mula eti....apita etta tatwaya yata kreemata nohakiya sattayata muhuna diya utuya....oba hari maga kumadda kiya tora ganna sahodaraya..

dinusha ariyarathna oba mona agamakata ayti kenedda..mata buddiya adu unata kamak naha namut mge guna darama bohoma ehali..mama katavkaranne ape rate kanttawa gana......eda pirimin bahula wasayen waridi wada karanawa..et ada kanttwa kotaram waradi karanawada..oyala es erala balannako...tamage darwa upan giyama marala danawa....demapiyawa eliyata edala danawa oya jeewat wenne erroppe....esa kan hodata erala balanna.....baudda agame hatiyata kantawak melawara bihi wenne pin adu nisa pirimiyek upadinne pin wadi nisa....jeevitaye yatartaya gana gaburen hitanna apita para suddage kunu godawal awasa naha...ape budda rata pirisidu kara ganna apita awassai..api ape rata gana balagamu.....me pitarata enna sankuritiyak nati eun ekka apita awassa naha ei hodaiyyak..api epadunet me baudda janma bumiye husama helannet me jannama bumiye.sinhala bauddayan api koi kaururut admkia bawaya wadi kara kara gata utui..me laou kika dewal walin api tika tika et viya utui....me bawa sasara harima bayankari....api dasa kusal walin walakila  ape sila bawana dinapata kala utui.....sit nitarama pirisidu viya utui.... ..pita ratiyage kunu harapa api noddanawa neme...mlokaye apamana du vidina kantawan gana mama hodata danbawa...muslim agame eda kantawa wahaliyak wrla duk vindda..kritiyani agame kantawata mul tana dunna...uttree tara budun eahanse kantwata sama tana dunna.....bangala des ,indiyawa ,aprican ,saudu wage ratawa kantwan hata ape rate kantawanta wage niti naha..sama tana dila tiyenne....paratama warata lokenma agamatiniya una sirimawo bandaranayaka..etin ada parli mentuwata giya aya yana enna kantawan ape rate wadi purma ennawa...yaha palanaya pakssa tiya monama pakssayata ape manapayak naha....namut bar kantawata tahanam karapu eka loku deyak....oyage mawata birdata adaraya karanba gaurawa karanna ape rate urm mau waru...sahodariyi ennawa ape rate..e wani ayata mama garu karanawa....kantawan gana danbe kantawa pamanai...apita penena de tamai api kiyanne ape awa bodaya hodatama eti..namut oba pili gana kamati naha me dewal siyallama anttya bawa..me loke manussa atmayaj labala karapu kusal pamani aran yanne ..jevitaye yatartaya awaboda kara gena me sasara dukun medina wayam karanna........oya saba piriyeknam sahodaraya jevitaya kumadda ..ape ati utu u sagaruwan wahanse namak muna gasila ..asanu mana vi.....ettatata muhuna denna one api ..kantawa visa katuwak kiyala lokap parakatayek hadun wala dela tibenewa..oyagwt ippuwa kiyawala tamai mamat me comment eka danne.....mama kantwak hatiyata garu karanawa mage maniyanta....mage maniyan me loke gana mama ugat detat wadaya kiya dee tibenewa....ada ape rate pirimi warada pata lenne me gahaniya nisamai..ekat oya hodata gawesanaya karala balanna......tawa sanba puluwan et mata nidi matai....ape loku kam patrakata dala sataya de wataha gamu.....teruwan saranai sohoura....

Udhudh Champa mama oya kanthawak kiyala danan hitiye ne. eth oyage me digaa comment eka kiyewwama therune oya harima buddiyen adu loke harima podiyata dakina kenek widihata. kanthawa godak duk widinne loke mona wage ratawalada kiyala issella hoyala balanna. ada engalanthe inna balawathma 5 dena pirimi neme kanthawan. ada loke ganu pirimi kiyala bedayak na. thamanta monawa hari awashya nan thaman mahansi unoth eka laga karaganna puluwan. oya pin adu kunuharapa unta kiwwoth bada palenna hina wei thamath gal yugaye inna minissu kiyala. ehema nattan hama dema pirimi wisin thamant karala dei kiyala balan inna aya kiyala. kanthawam waradi karanawa kiyala ekata uttare thawa thawa kanthawan oppress karanawanan. oyata thawa loke gana godak dewal igena ganna thiyenawa. anika lankwe pirimi mechchara utum nam lankawe janagahanaya hatiyata dushana sankayawa balannako. hoyala baluwoth lankawa indiyawa wage ratawalne (budum wadiya ratawal ne mewa). ethakota me okkoma neethi nathi ganui pirimi kiyala bedayak nathi ratawala sanskruthiya adu nidahasata mul thana dena widely sudu minissunge ratawala ai me apachara dushana adu??? tikak hithanna purudu wenna. lankawa kiyanne me loke ekama ratawath minissu athin baluwoth hodama  yahapathma ratawath neme. ratak unama yanna orne issarahata misa passata neme.

dinusha ariyarathna ane me pirimyek wage kata karanna..Utarrevtara budu piyanan wahasse pirmita kantawanta kiya naha poduwe..katat mat pan panaya ahitakari ewagema paw..oya kata karanne viwada karanne mikak sadahada..kantawan meliwa bihi wanne pin madu nisa eka saba yatat taya.ewagema tamai.....pirimimiyek wenna pin karanna one .utum buddatawata labannat pirimin ...mama kantawak kantawa pahat wada karanawanam eya api kelin kata kaeanawa boru muluchchawata boru kitanna awassa naha....mama mage mawata godak garu karananawa...ape rate utum maueu waru sylu wasayen hari ennawa...namut eyalag katin aha ganba kantawa kopmana duka gahata vidinawada..manusikawa saha kaikawa.. ..ai sanssare pin adu nisai me kantawan wasayen epadune...oba wani aya nisa nam me rate sarayata kawadawat tana natiwei....satayata muhuna denna......ada kantawa tama samiyage sawmi bakttiya raka gena enne slu pirsai...ewagema udara mu waru ennet slu pirisai ada kauda waradi wada karanne kantawa...mama sadaranaya patta balanne..ada pirimi bohoma adui waradi wada karanawa..namut kantawa kopmana waradi karanawada... ..mamat kantawak nusama ada samahaye kantawan karana darunu wada nusama kala kirila....etata kiyanai bima eda ganai mama baya naha..wesa munu bada genena naha ..ada yahapat kanawata tanak naha mewani kanrawan nusama...oba tikak hitanna me mulu lokayama kantawan desa balanna....ganikawi kauda kantawan H iv.ragao bowenne kaurun nusada pirimin yanne ohun lagata ganikawan eda dena nisa neda..ada aniyam pema nusa asadana daruwan billata tanawa....pirimiya menee maruwek wrla hire tapainawa..natinamam siya divi hanikara ganaawa..natinam kara birda gatanatanaya karala pirimiya hire laginawa....oya kiyapu vidiye kenwk nowe mama mama tama taruna kantawak..oyala ehama hitana eakt paw..habai stin mage wadihityo oyage me comment baluwa...etin eyala kiyannwt obala wage ayata anykampa karanna kiyala....kokomat obala wage ayata api samawa denewa......kalyana mituran esuru karanna.lokaya desa hidata balanna..teruwan saeanai....sahodaraya...

Udhudh Champa ahahahaha üòÇüòÇüòÇ ganayekda? ponnayekda? na bn ape paule kisi kenek math pan pawichchi karanne ne. habai bonna orne nan orne kenekta puluwan kisi thahanamakuth na. mokada sanskruthiyata wada watinne nidahasane. anika sanskruthiya hadanneth minissumane... mata me hitha ganna bari budu humuduruwo kanthawanta witharak bonna epa kiwwe koi sutreda kiyala. pingutaraya. tho wage ekek rate mul putuwe idan inna hinda thama dan awrudu 2 rata eka thana thiyenne.

dinusha ariyarathna ane paw oyala wage aya enna gana kiyanna apita lajjai..mama hitanne oyalage amma nangila mat pan walata ebahi wechcha aya wennaa eati..neda paule ekata hida mat pan bona paulak wenba eti neda tamatana diyaniyak sitnawanam oya wage kunu harapen tawat taruna kantawakata ohoma kiyanne naha..habi mata oya kiyapu eka wachanayak ege ellene naha..mata eti wadakut naha..oyala oyalatama kiya gatta parusa wachchana tikak..sinhala tarnayek wennat baha..bauddaywk wennat baha...mokada oyage hadiyawa hodata pennum kernewa..habai etin mata kisa dukak naha tamynge comment ekata mata hina giya misak dukak naha..mata mekat hida vinidanssayak....me baudda rate sanskrutiya sada charaya tamuynla wge aya vinasa karanawa..tamulata  marene mohete matk wri karpu paw..enisa tamyla wage ayata api matree karanawa mokada tamunla wage tawa visala pirisak ennawa..manisika rogeen wtin waddya pareesnayakata yomu unot lagadima hodai anagatayata...teruwan saranai sahoooo

Udhudh Champa ane palayan hutta yanna thoge maha loku logic...! 1. therun ganin lankawa kiyanne 3 loke ratak.
2. therum ganin neethi ganunta witharak danna ba. attama lankawe kiyannath lajjai ohoma ponna wada karanakota. thahanan karanawanan degollontama thahanan karanna orne. kanthawan kiyanne pin adu aya? ahahaha pin gona

comments.comment: dawasin dawasa vnasa karanawa hemadama waga genu math kudu vkuna ahuwanaea  ganu aga daka saya adan niruwatha panna adum adinawa awa adachara samajayakata obinne awata vrudda parata awoth ki danak prtichara dakwaeda ma arakku wanuwan himiwanna one kiyanna tiyanna apa rata matin thora ratak hadanna parata ana ayata apa sahayogayath noaduwama labae  janadipati thuma rata waunwan ma balabath ahosi karima gana oba thumata godak pin jayama wawa kalin uththara dunna akata sthtiya  ma ammandila arakku wanuwan radda ussanaea lajjae mulu lakoma anthara jala magin ma veediyo narabanaea wedagath da vtharak pala karanna yamak bala sathutu wanna puluwan nam aka thamae apa mau bima wanuwan apa sathata apa uthm sri lankawata jayawawa matin thora ratak hadanna parata anna siyalu danatama theruwan saranae
comments.author: Lath A

comments.comment: Apage Rate vena prasna Attema netida Oka tami me lankavata vela tiyenne henaya.
comments.author: Dhrmapriya Jayathissa

comments.comment: kaiyanna tiyanna ada eya niliyak wala aitiwasikam gena hoyanna arakkuda one para balliya thipita matin thora ratak one kiya udgosana karanam mulu lokama gaurawaya himi eanna tibuna den homagama vlilajja neti dayak nisa nada una apa hoda genu aya wagama sikarat akakwath nobaona pirimi ennawa a ayaga athmaya kalasannetiwa unnoth hodae  onema pahath dayakata radda ussana aya one thatan ennawa geniyak hetiyata aka mata eagam sadachara samajayakata aka obina dayak namae parata waruko vlpaththuwa dawasin dawasa vnasakaranaea apa ranavru hiragata gannawa apa rata baragath veerodara ranavruwo kiya baraganna waralla mathkudu vkynana aka genu ayata hoda dayak namae kiya ediriyata avth awata vrudda hada naganna beri ai apa lankaea ennawa hoda niliyo gaekawo sujatha atthanayaka malani bulath sinhala anna ayala athamae niyama  genu ohala thuttu daka ammandila ganayata thamae wetanna api hoda dayak wanuwan parata amu awan ayata api hemoma asiwada karanawa sahayogaya danawa awan ayata jaya wawa  apa mau bima wanuwan hoda dayak karanna pal gasamu arakku bothala wanuwan radda ussanana apa maka baudda rata sadachara sampanna hatak hadamu theruwan saranae
comments.author: Lath A
